official_title: A bill to provide a $100 bonus to each Vietnam-era veteran and an additional $400 bonus to each Vietnam-era combat veteran.

summary.text: Vietnam-era Veteran Bonus Act - Requires the Secretary of Defense to pay a lump-sum of $100 to each qualified Vietnam-era veteran, and an additional lump- sum of $400 to each qualified Vietnam-era combat veteran, or to such veteran's survivor if such veteran is deceased. Directs the Secretary to identify and inform eligible veterans of such bonus program so they may apply. Terminates the period for making application three years after the first appropriation of funds under this Act.
